title: From Saint Pablo to Saint Regina?
itunes:title: From Saint Pablo to Saint Regina?
description:
WED 9/7 - Fresh off of Kanye's "Saint Pablo" tour, Charlamagne rants & raves about one of the best live shows he's ever seen. Actress Regina Hall joins The Breakfast Club to discuss her new movie "When The Bough Breaks" and how she almost became a nun instead of an actress. How many prayers will it take to get Envy & Charlamagne to see her movie?

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
